subject: [Radiance-general] How to leave out the legend in a falsecolorimage
body:
Dear Per,

I understand that choosing 0 as the value for the -lw or -lh options will
eliminate the legend.

Hope it helps! Bye

German


2013/4/12 Per Haugaard <perhaugaard at yahoo.dk>
